general.gigTitle: do website development for your business, wordpress website

sellerCard.description:
Hi, I’m Mayra Khan, a web developer with 7 years of experience and 436 completed projects under my belt. I’m passionate about creating websites that don’t just look great but actually help your business grow. Whether you're a startup looking to make your mark or an established brand aiming to reach a bigger audience, I’m here to help.

I focus on building responsive, SEO-friendly WordPress websites that work smoothly on any device, giving your visitors the best experience possible. Let’s work together to bring your vision to life and create a website that really makes an impact!

description.content:
In today's competitive digital world, a sleek and efficient Business website is essential for any business looking to scale.


Hey, Mayra Khan here. Do you want a top-quality WordPress website or business site for web and mobile that outperforms your competitors?


If yes, then Ill help you do that.  

Here's the plan:


  • I will design a professional WordPress website thats fully mobile responsive.
  • High-quality images, icons, and animations will be added to make your site stand out.
  • Ill incorporate premium widgets to boost user engagement and enhance the overall experience.
  • My goal is to help your business grow online and reach a wider audience through an optimized, user-friendly site.


Why choose me

 

  • On-time Delivery 7 years of experience
  • 100% money-back guarantee
  • Fast Understanding Skills
  • 24/7 Customer Support
  • Will properly Guide you on how to manage


What I Will Provide

 

  • Fully responsive, professional website
  • High-quality HD images, icons, and animations
  • SEO and mobile-friendly structure
  • Speed optimization fast loading
  • E-commerce &payments
  • FREE copyright-free images and graphics
  • Unlimited support


You can message me to discuss design of your site.

24/7 Available.

slide.name: do website development for your business, wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Why should I hire you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: This may be the first question which may come to your mind that why should I give you preference over the other sellers. Well, in small words, I take care of my clients and take the responsibility of the work I do. Even after months, if any issue come in the website, I'll be

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need before I get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To develop any website, we need: - Domain - Hosting However, if you do not have any of the above available, please contact us and we can surely assist in arranging all.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I edit my website after it is developed?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely Yes! Once the website developed, we can provide you small instructional videos and within minutes you can learn the editing of your website and can manage small tasks like updating text content, updating images etc, very much easily

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Hosting & Domain too ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not provide Hosting & Domain, there are various providers available but I can help you choose which plan will be suitable for you.

packageList.title: Basic
packageList.description: Landing Pages Website + Eye Catching Design + Mobile Responsive + HD Graphics+ 2 weeks free Support

packageList.title: Standard
packageList.description: Basic Pkg+ Up to 5 Pages+ On page SEO+ Google Map Integration + 3 weeks Free Support

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: 10-15 Pages Wordpress website+Free Stock Images+Mobile Responsive+Latest Fonts+Custom Graphics

reviews.comment: She did a great job, followed all my wishes and instructions and made this a simple process!

Mayra was an absolute pleasure to work with. She's not only very detailed and specific with her work but very easy to plan and communicate with. We are on complete other sides of the world and the communication was never a problem. She attacked my store head on and it was very high quality. I'm happy with her work and will recommend her to anyone undergoing website reconstruction.

Great work! Created a solid website for my business- she payed close attention to detail to ensure my clients ease of accessibility and ease of navigation were priority. Thanks again! Highly recommend.

Mayra Khan did an EXCELLENT job with my website development! Her work was bug-free, highly professional, and she showed great attention to detail. She went above and beyond with deep understanding and quick responsiveness—truly a pleasure to work with! 👍
